A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a stand alone sci fi film it was pretty to watch but had a truly weak narrative\, As a star wars film\, oh boy\, a disaster. Added nothing to the roots of the Force Awakens\, cringey dialogue\, ruined classic characters\, poor motivations and the list goes on. Never would I have thought after enjoying rouge one and TFA that this would fall so far from grace\, leading me to miss the days of Lucas at the helm.
